title: Superboy v3 (Kon-El/Conner Kent)
description:
Collection of Superboy v3, Superboy and the Ravers and various one-shots featuring Kon-El/Conner Kent, the hybrid human/Kryptonian, cloned from Superman and his arch nemesis Lex Luthor.

Superboy first appeared in 1993 within the Reign of the Supermen storyline following the Death of Superman in 1992. He received his own title in 1994 which lasted for 100 issues, ending in 2002. In the series, Superboy settles in Hawaii with a supporting cast consisting of his sleazy agent Rex Leech, Rex's daughter Roxy, the being from the genetically engineered race at Cadmus called "DNAliens" known as Dubbilex, TV reporter Tana Moon, and Bibbo Bibbowski's white puppy named Krypto.

Also included is Superboy and the Ravers which chronicles the adventures of Superboy and a group of Earth meta-clique that hung out with the intergalactic rave, known as the Event Horizon, led by Kindred Marx. All the metas would literally go all over the universe and find places to party.


Released on http://ComicPirates.info
